title: Coronavirus news highlights: 'Kerala, Maharashtra, UP, Karnataka, Bengal account for 72% of total Covid active cases'
description: With 10,064 new Covid-19 cases, India reports the lowest spike since June. In the last 24, hours, 17,411 people were discharged and 137 deaths were reported, as per the Union Health Ministry.  As of now, the total novel coronavirus cases stand at 1,05,81,837. While active cases are 2,00,528, a total of 1,02,28,753 have been discharged. The death toll now stands at 1,52,556.  India's total Covid-19 recoveries have surpassed the active caseload by more than one crore, the Union Health Ministry said on Monday, terming it as a landmark achievement. Stay tuned for more updates.
